Message.Title: A trillion here, a trillion there, pretty soon we are talking about a lot of money.
Message.Msg: How can this country survive? Socialism stops in only one way. You run out of money.

Topic.Title: Obama's very first act as president, makes him look like someone with something to hide, not the person that swore that if elected, his administration would be the most OPEN presidential administration ever, you decide!

Message.Msg: The obama that is president is not the same person as the young obama we've read about. Miracle of plastic surgery.
October 16 is the next EPS report, and then January 22

Message.Title: Breakout Soon?
Message.Msg: This weekend I have heard there are many technical traders mentioning the chart pattern of IBM. The stock should break out soon in heavier volume. Certainly by October 16, but could be sooner. I see $220 in the month of October.
